query:
SELECT s.nonce, s.ciphertext
               FROM secrets s
               JOIN environments e ON e.id = s.env_id
               JOIN projects p ON p.id = e.project_id
              WHERE s.workspace_id = ?
                AND e.workspace_id = ?
                AND p.workspace_id = ?
                AND p.name = ? AND e.name = ? AND s.key_name = ?
